definition: head/chief/first (occasion, thing etc)/classifier for poems, songs etc
woven mat/seat/banquet/place in a democratic assembly/classifier for banquets, conversations etc
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: Taft's son later became Chief Justice and United States President.
sentences.chinese: 阿方索塔夫特的兒子後來成爲首席法官和美國總統。

sentences.english: The presiding judge asked if she wished to add anything to her testimony.
sentences.chinese: 首席法官問她是否還想對她的證詞補充些什麼。

sentences.english: Hanna didn`t understand what the presiding judge was getting at.
sentences.chinese: 漢娜並不明白首席法官指的是什麼。

sentences.english: Alphonso Taft's son later became Chief Justice and United States President.
sentences.chinese: 阿方索塔夫特的兒子後來成爲首席法官和美國總統。

sentences.english: He is now the Principal Youth Court Judge for New Zealand.
sentences.chinese: 他現在是新西蘭的青年法院的首席法官。

sentences.english: But the presiding judge interpreted it that way and responded sharply.
sentences.chinese: 但首席法官做了如是解釋，給予嚴厲的駁斥。

sentences.english: I did go to the presiding judge after all. I couldn`t make myself visit Hanna.
sentences.chinese: 我最後去拜訪了首席法官，沒有去看望漢娜。

sentences.english: Rehnquist, C. J. , delivered the opinion for a unanimous Court.
sentences.chinese: 首席法官倫奎斯特發表一致意見。

definition: grand justice/high court justice/supreme court justice
Supreme Court of the United States
pinyin: Mei3 guo2 Zui4 gao1 Fa3 yuan4
